ZeroTier UI - Axum Version

Welcome to the new Axum-based ZeroTier UI backend!

API Endpoints:

  • POST /api/login - Login
  • GET /api/logout - Logout (requires auth)
  • GET /api/check - Check auth status (requires auth)
  • POST /api/editprofile - Update profile (requires auth)
  • ANY /ztapi/* - ZeroTier API proxy (requires auth)
